E-mail client: Can interface with email clients and Mail Merge Wizard can send email directly from LibreOffice[27]
Online editing: Currently via free plugins; LibreOffice Online under development.[28]

E-mail client: Microsoft Outlook (Not included in Microsoft Office 2013 or 2016 Home & Student)[29][30]
HTML editor: Microsoft SharePoint Designer. Versions after Office 2000 Premium and Developer contain Microsoft FrontPage  the full-blown web page editor. Microsoft Word can read and write HTML starting with a free special upgrade for Word 6.0

Software Name: OfficeSuite Mail for Windows  AquaMail for Android
